name: Wampee Helicopters
description:
Wampee HelicoptersAbout the Game
Wampee Helicopters Is 3D action game, part 3d platformer/shoot em up, involving Helicopters and blasting your way to the goal.
21 action packed levels, a large variety of enemies.
Hi, the inspiration of this game was from early 3D video games of the mid 90’s.
The Goal was to make a 3D game based on the limitations early 3D video games had, with a retro based soundtrack, and 90’s Art style.


  • Genre, 3D action/ 3d platformer/3rd person shooter
  • A game based on flight
  • Low poly 3D environment
